message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $13,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
